attributes.action: block any move towards a 'Big Brother’ database for phones and e-mails
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Officials have put forward plans for ISP's and telephone companies to hand over email and phone records to the home office onto a massive database.

This is firstly a violation of our human rights, specifically our right to privacy.

But in addition it is a waste of time,
and the ISP's should not even be asked to store this information for 12 months.

Simply because it is easy to avoid detection by many simple means.

We urge the prime minister to intervene and stop the waste of money that could be spent on this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
